title: Riot Games : Stepphen (Please Read it) (banned)
body:
Riot Games.
Hello my name is stepphen in real life and im a youtuber for 2 years now and i love making league of legends videos. So im playing league of legends for like  5 years now and i was always a little bit toxic. I just got permanent ban on my account right now and i really apologise about that, also today i just purchase riot points (20 euros) i know its alot , Where am i going to? I just wanna get unbanned. Like its not even fair i just put like 100 euros in this account and thats really a waste? 100 euros for me its so much and i feel so stupid when im thinking that all goes to waste. Please riot games i really want to get unbanned for the money and for all the time i just spend in this account and all of the money i spend in this account. Okay so im really sorry and i apologise for everything i write in league of legends game chat i'll never do it again and i wanna get unbanned. You can permanent mute me or mute me for how long you want but do not ban me please riot games don't do this to me. Also my youtube channel is gonna go down for that. i dont wanna make you feel bad so you will unban me but thats how i feel and thats how it is for me. 

Im Sorry for everything i've done riot games, im really sorry and i really apologise for everything, i hope you will read this and i hope you will unban me.
Also sorry for my bad english im from greece and im not the best :D thank you very much riot games please read it.
I love you riot games.

Bye
Stepphen.

replies.body:
First, I want to acknowledge that we do appreciate your time playing with us, but neither time played nor money spent in game excuses or validates any negativity you displayed in game. All players are expected to be upstanding and positive sports and to avoid negative behavior.

I can't say for certain whether that recently bought RP can be refunded or if the ban will be considered for a reduction, but I can say for certain I'm sadly unable to help you here on Boards. Instead, you'll want to [**open a ticket with us ASAP**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you haven't already to discuss the punishment in private with them. :(

Howdy ZT Kaze,

To answer your question I will quote **Riot Games Support**.

If I understand correctly, your account was suspended due to the violation of the [**Summoner's Code**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/). You normally received [Warnings and Punishments](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h1q2) before the permanent suspension of your account .

_**First Offense:** 10 Game Chat Restriction
**Second Offense:** 25 Game Chat Restriction
**Third Offense:** Two Week Suspension
**Fourth Offense:** Permanent Suspension_

''However, it is possible to skip to a Two Week or Permanent suspension based on the severity of the behavior in the game. Excessive negative behavior can result in a Two-Week or Permanent suspension at any time without having a chat restriction on the account.''

As for your ''[**Unban**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended#h1q2)''... It just won't happen. Riot's policy is towards the Instant Feedback System is that they _will not be lifted or shortened under any circumstance_... That applies even if you are a paying user.

I am very sorry for the loss of your account.

Sincerely,
-Bladenite
Thank you very much for everything you said 1st. i didn't know that from warnings it goes to a perm 2nd its okay i dont care if its 14 day ban or anything just dont be permanent please :(
Riot's policy is that punishments are not overturned when they are not in error. You can try opening a support ticket, and see what Riot support says.
